relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Officer walk throughout the campus, they have emergency poles places throughout out the campus, and have a 24 hour call service.
Tons of club, club sports, and more.
The food court offers meals plans, coupons for food, and has specials once a week.
SIUE has a new movie or band playing every Friday night.
Very good food, with lots of choices.
SIUE has kind caring teacher who are very knowledgeable in their flied.
Focus on the individual score on the act more then the whole score.
I love SIUE, it is a great school. And I would recommend it to anyone who is think of college.
pageTitle: SIU Edwardsville (SIUE) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {27252=The food and dining at SIUe are amazing! There are places to eat in many different buildings so it's easy to grab a snack between any classes. SIUe's food and dining include: an Entree's, a pasta bar, nacho bar, potato bar, Deli/Panini/ a Grill, Wok (Chinese), Chick-Fil-A, University Restaurant, Kaldi's, Starbucks, Pizza Hut/Wing Street, Taco Bell, Union Station, Skywalk Food Court, Commons Grill, Woodland Cart, Bluff Cafe, Auntie Ann's, Sweet E's (ice cream), and my personal favorite Freshens. There's also a rumor on campus about a Panara Bread for the 2012-2013 year., 252751=Tuition is only 2900 per semester, with fees it comes around to about 4000 a semester which isn't bad at all for a University. You get a great education for a low tuition cost., 439266=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 334446=Parties and chilling with friends in the dorms. Without a car, you won't be able to enjoy having fun off campus after a certain time of the day because the buses leaving and coming back to campus stop after about 5:00 pm}

You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Great for these types of students If you like: ~ To meet people from all over the USA and world ~ Nature and animals ~ To learn about yourself and others ~ Cheer for division 1 soccer and volleyball Tips for prospective students Get involved just like high school, when you join activities you meet so many new people! Take advantage of the Student Fitness Center! It is apart of your tuition! Bang for the buck I think I am getting a great education here. Housing is wonderful and the prices are reasonable. Am enjoying being here I love SIUe a lot. I have lived in housing for both my years here and I love it. The Resident Assistants are wonderful and help when you need them. Am learning a lot Classes here at SIUe are challenging. However SIUe is a great place to learn outside of the classroom. Your instructors and professors make it a priority to teach you what you need to know and help get real-life, hands-on experience. Login to rate or flag the reviews
